item.title: 美国银行哈特内特警告：抛售反弹的美股和美元
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）的策略师表示，投资者应在美股和美元反弹时卖出，并提醒说，持续上涨的条件还不具备。【原文：Bank of America Corp. strategists said investors should sell into rallies in US stocks and the dollar, cautioning that the conditions for sustained gains are missing.】

item.description:

item.title: 美国股市的关税风险即将暴露无遗
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的一系列关税措施将暴露出美国股市在贸易战面前有多么脆弱。【原文：President Donald Trump’s raft of tariffs is set to expose just how vulnerable the US stock market is to a trade war.】

item.title: 莫内塔银行首席执行官认为捷克更激进降息的可能性上升
item.description: 莫内塔货币银行（Moneta Money Bank AS）负责人表示，全球贸易战的风险及其可能对欧洲经济产生的负面影响可能会迫使捷克政策制定者比计划中更多地削减借贷成本。【原文：The risks of global trade wars and their likely negative impact on the European economy may force Czech policymakers to cut borrowing costs more than they planned, according to the head of Moneta Money Bank AS.】

item.title: 如果用欧元购买油桶，油价依然便宜
item.description: 原油期货从本月早些时候的低谷强劲反弹，除非您用欧元买入。【原文：Crude futures have had a strong rebound from their nadir earlier this month — unless you’re buying in euros.】

item.title: 捷克放松预算规定，允许增加国防开支
item.description: 捷克立法者修改了该国的预算规则，允许增加国防开支，因为财政保守的政府试图应对俄罗斯入侵乌克兰带来的安全风险。【原文：Czech lawmakers amended the country’s budget rules to allow more spending on defense as the fiscally conservative government seeks to respond to security risks stemming from Russian aggression in Ukraine.】

item.title: 加拿大和澳大利亚投票将考验特朗普的全球反弹力
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在 11 月 5 日的大选中获胜，为执政者的糟糕一年画上了句号，因为在史无前例的大选年中，独裁民粹主义者在全球各地赢得了地盘。不到六个月后，潮流似乎正在转向。【原文：Donald Trump’s Nov. 5 victory capped a bad year for incumbents as authoritarian populists gained ground across the globe in an unprecedented year of elections. Less than six months later, the tide seems to be turning.】

item.title: 受高昂投入成本影响，玛鲁蒂铃木利润低于预期
item.description: 印度最大的汽车制造商马鲁蒂铃木印度有限公司（Maruti Suzuki India Ltd.）公布的季度利润低于预期，原因是积极的营销支出和投入成本上升超过了销量的小幅增长。【原文：Maruti Suzuki India Ltd., India’s largest carmaker, reported a smaller-than-expected quarterly profit as aggressive marketing spends and rising input costs outweighed a modest rise in sales.】

item.title: 中国游客减少，泰国吸引欧洲富裕游客
item.description: 在科维德疫情爆发前，中国人是东南亚国家的主要度假群体，但现在中国人出于安全考虑避开了泰国，因此泰国计划加强宣传，吸引高消费的欧洲游客。【原文：Thailand plans to step up a campaign to attract high-spending European tourists as the Chinese, the dominant group of holidaymakers to the Southeast Asian country before the Covid pandemic, shun it on safety concerns.】

item.title: 丰田供应商爱信因关税和中国市场下滑下调财年业绩预期
item.description: 爱信公司将其年度营业利润指导下调了三分之一，理由是受到美国关税、中国市场份额萎缩以及国内 OEM 产量下降的影响。【原文：Aisin Corp. cut its annual operating profit guidance by a third, citing the impact of US tariffs, a shrinking market share in China and a decline in domestic OEM production volume.】

item.title: 印尼酝酿出口稀有大米以促进与国外的关系
item.description: 印度尼西亚正在考虑出口大米，这对于一个经常自行进口大米的国家来说实属罕见，目的是与需要这种主食的国家建立友好关系。【原文：Indonesia is considering exporting rice, a rare phenomenon for a country that often imports itself, in a bid to bolster goodwill with nations in need of the staple grain.】

item.title: 美国寻求与印度就电子商务、农作物和数据存储达成贸易协议
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，正在讨论的美印贸易协定将涵盖 19 个类别，包括扩大农产品、电子商务、数据存储和关键矿产的市场准入，这是达成一项可能有助于南亚国家规避对其商品征收更高关税的协议的第一步。【原文：A US-India trade agreement under discussion will cover 19 categories, including greater market access for farm goods, e-commerce, data storage and critical minerals, people familiar with the matter said, the first step toward a deal that may help the South Asian nation evade higher tariffs on its goods.】

item.title: 瑞士央行施莱格尔称，瑞士比其他国家更能感受到关税的影响
item.description: 瑞士央行行长表示，瑞士比其他国家更容易受到与美国贸易冲突的影响。【原文：Switzerland is more exposed to the trade conflict with the US than other countries, according to its central bank chief.】

item.title: 菲律宾银行首席执行官称关税战将带来 "最坏的预期
item.description: 菲律宾最大的贷款机构菲律宾银行首席执行官表示，在美国关税带来不确定性的情况下，菲律宾银行警告其他银行要 "做好最坏的打算"，因此提高了不良贷款拨备。【原文：The Philippines’ top lender has boosted provisions for bad loans as it warned fellow banks to “expect the worst” amid the uncertainty posed by US tariffs, according to its chief executive.】

item.title: 萨博首席执行官认为国防订单交付的交付周期正在缩短
item.description: 瑞典防务制造商萨博公司（Saab AB）认为，随着许多国家在地缘政治紧张局势加剧的情况下竞相重新武装，客户越来越重视缩短交货时间。【原文：Swedish defense manufacturer Saab AB sees customers increasingly focused on cutting down delivery times as many countries race to rearm in the face of deepening geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长霍尔茨曼认为美国关税会导致通货紧缩
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）表示，美国宣布加征关税的影响可能会拖累欧元区的消费价格，而不会引发新一轮通胀。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Robert Holzmann said the fallout from the US tariff announcements will probably weigh on consumer prices in the euro zone rather than create a new bout of inflation.】

item.title: 贸易战风险令策略师放弃对欧洲股市的乐观预期
item.description: 在多次上调欧洲股市评级追逐市场一个月后，策略师们又因波动性和贸易紧张局势而削减了目标。【原文：A month after chasing the market with multiple upgrades for European stocks, strategists are back to cutting their targets, spooked by volatility and trade tensions.】

item.title: 指数称匈牙利中央银行指控其基金会存在欺诈行为
item.description: Index 援引熟悉内情的人士的话报道称，由新上任的匈牙利央行行长米哈里-瓦尔加（Mihaly Varga）任命的匈牙利央行基金会新管理层对前任领导层涉嫌欺诈和挪用公款的行为提出了指控。【原文：The new management of the Hungarian central bank’s foundation, appointed by recently installed Governor Mihaly Varga, has pressed charges on suspected fraud and misappropriation under the previous leadership, Index reported, citing people familiar with the matter it didn’t name.】

item.title: 地缘政治担忧打击市场情绪，印度资产表现不佳
item.description: 由于交易商担心与邻国巴基斯坦的地缘政治局势可能恶化，印度的股票和债券暴跌。【原文：Stocks and bonds tumbled in India, as traders braced for a potential worsening of the geopolitical situation with neighboring Pakistan.】

item.title: 迪拜分类广告公司呼吁投资者把握房地产市场繁荣机遇
item.description: 未来几周，两家总部位于迪拜的在线房地产平台将向股权投资者发出邀请，这将为寻求利用迪拜房地产市场繁荣的公司提供更多机会。【原文：Two Dubai-based online property platforms are sounding out equity investors over the coming weeks, adding to a flurry of firms seeking to harness the city’s real estate boom.】

item.title: 苹果公司的目标是到 2026 年底在印度为美国制造大部分 iPhone 手机
item.description: 苹果公司的目标是到明年年底从印度进口其在美国销售的大部分苹果手机，加速向中国以外的市场转移，以降低与关税和地缘政治紧张局势有关的风险。【原文：Apple Inc. aims to import most of the iPhones it sells in the US from India by the end of next year, accelerating a shift beyond China to mitigate risks related to tariffs and geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: Klarna 首席执行官的 Flat Capital 将投资任务扩展至国防领域
item.description: Flat Capital AB 是 Klarna 联合创始人塞巴斯蒂安-西米亚特考夫斯基（Sebastian Siemiatkowski）及其妻子妮娜-西米亚特考夫斯基（Nina Siemiatkowski）的投资公司，该公司已将其战略扩展至国防领域。【原文：Flat Capital AB, the investment firm of Klarna co-founder Sebastian Siemiatkowski and his wife Nina Siemiatkowski, has broadened its strategy to include picks in the defense sector.】

item.title: 在特朗普关税冲击之前，晴朗天气提振了英国零售业销售额
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策动摇消费者信心之前，3 月份破纪录的阳光帮助英国零售额连续第三个月攀升。【原文：Record-breaking sunshine in March helped UK retail sales climb for a third straight month before consumer confidence was rocked by Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 消费行业导致英国 "严重 "企业困境激增
item.description: 根据咨询公司贝吉斯-特雷诺（Begbies Traynor）的一份报告，由于首当其冲受到支出下降和信心减弱的影响，英国最面向消费者的行业的困境急剧增加。【原文：Distress among the UK’s most consumer-facing sectors has surged as they bear the brunt of lower spending and weaker confidence, according to a report by the consultant Begbies Traynor.】
